name: Dungeons of Despair
overview: Dungeons of Despair - You must escape! Hurry to find the way out of the dangerous dungeon! Gather the hidden jewels and find the secret passageway that will lead you to safety. Give the computer two word commands to progress yourself through the game. Alaskan Wilderness - Tame the forbidden wilderness! Provide the computer with the correct commands to assemble the dog sled team and find the treasures hidden in the snow! Taken Alive - You've been kidnapped! Trapped in a nine story building in the middle of nowhere you find you must escape before the captors realize you are missing! Provide the computer with the correct commands to get you out of this mess!
